articles.description: The South Asian country accounted for 46% of new coronavirus cases globally and one in every four deaths in the past week, said the World Health Organization.

articles.title: Man Arrested In San Francisco Stabbing Of 2 Asian Women - NPR
articles.description: The two women, aged 84 and 63, were attacked while waiting at a bus stop on Tuesday, police said. It's the latest in a string of nationwide violence against Asian Americans during the pandemic.
articles.content:

articles.title: Groups call on ADB to stop funding fossil fuel projects - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Several civil society groups trooped to the headquarters of the Asian Development Bank in Manila, to urge the multilateral lender to halt its financing of dirty energy and cancel the debts of developing member countries.
